item.title: All aboard the AI hp hype train!
item.description: “Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic” -Arthur Clarke, a man who would be out of a job had Claude been a thing in his day Artificial Intelligence. Where do I begin? Perhaps by asking if it’ll steal my job? Or will it overthrow the government? Or maybe have it simply write this blog for me? Disclaimer: Yes this post is 100% made by a human, source: trust me bro
